title: Bug 10022: Incorrect enablement of 'Build' popup action
description: The 'Build' popup action in the context-sensitive menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when a manual build is not necessary.
OB: The 'Build' popup action in the context-sensitive menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, regardless of the build status.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when a manual build is required.
SR: To reproduce this issue, open the Java perspective and observe that the 'Build' action is always enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu, regardless of the build status of the project or file.
